comment.author: 21042979@N00
comment._content: "WITHIN three days last week no less than 210 girls made up their minds they wanted to be farmers. The 210 came from many different social classes, but for the most part they were women of education." March 5, 1911, Sunday Section: Drama Society Fashions Music, Page X7, 1888 words query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=980DE7DE1431E233A...

comment._content: It didn't reopen the next year: query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=F20D1FFE3E5813738...
